title: A new Covid-19 drug and a second wave
description: The steroid Dexamethasone has been hailed a “major breakthrough” in the treatment of Covid-19. But what does the data say? Plus, why haven’t mass protests led to a second wave?
itunes:subtitle: Tim Harford looks into why protests haven’t led to a spike in Covid-19 cases
